predicate.note: Frames file for 'jinx' based on sentences in wsj. No access to Verbnet at the moment.

example.name: the one example
example.text: But their study, which spanned the 1962-85 period, has since been shown [*-1] to be jinxed [*-86] by an unlucky choice of data.
example.arg: [*-86] -> [*-1] -> their study, which spanned the 1962-85 period,
